title: Vuelta a España stage 16: Jonas Vingegaard smashes summit finish, cuts gap to Sepp Kuss
content:
Kuss retains red jersey but loses time to both Vingegaard and Roglič as Jumbo-Visma's leadership strategy looks in tension.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España stage 16: Jonas Vingegaard smashes summit finish, cuts gap to Sepp Kuss on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
